info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pitkin County through 545 PM MDT... At 522 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aspen, or 36 miles southeast of Glenwood Springs, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Pitkin County. This includes Colorado 82 between mile markers 37 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
